channel.title: Changing Ammo
channel.description:
Hey, Zammy's back :D. Well... right now i pretty much coded the PERFECT rune c'bow except for one stupid little thing... bolts. Right now it only fires arrows, I already added bolts to item.java as arrows so dont waste your time explaining that. The only thing i need is how to change it to fire bolts.
Peace, Zamorak[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 03, 2007, 02:46:17 PM[/size][hr]I really need to get this fixed... please post
